biotools.summary: Cis-regulatory elements using short motifs that are known to bind regulatory proteins.  Predictions are made by searching for clusters of these motifs, and weighting these clusters by applying a positive or negative training sets to score the sequence.

bioschemas.name: jPREdictor
bioschemas.summary: Cis-regulatory elements using short motifs that are known to bind regulatory proteins.  Predictions are made by searching for clusters of these motifs, and weighting these clusters by applying a positive or negative training sets to score the sequence.
